column4: you get "sensors-detect" and "sensors".  You run sensors-detect first
I installed lm-sensors,but I can't find executable files to it, where I have to see?
there are some gui frontends too, but i don't about them.  xsensors and ksensors
ok I'm looking about them, tx
hmm I tried to start sensors-detect and sensors but seem that I need to mount additional modules....
yeah, sensors-detect should tell you what you need and print it out
I have to mount these modules with modprobe?
yeah, this time.  In the future you just add it to the file it tells you to
Ok, It shows me which modules has to be installed but named with long description.... and no with its real module name
I can look them on internet? what about this?
the last thing the sensors-detect script should output is some stuff to add to /etc/modules.  That should contain the name of the modules
Ok well done, I'm watching my device temperatures!! thanks you!
